channel.title: Need a bit of Help ^^
channel.description:
I purchased a VPS to run a server on that I've been messing around with, I changed the ip in the client (client.java) to the IP of the VPS, and now it doesn't work? The client doesn't even load, it just says 'error connecting trying in 5.' I've tried using 3 different clients all 317 clients, none of them seem to let me login the server if it's going to my VPS's IP. But when I try them on my original IP Address it works on all 3 clients =\
My windows firewall is off, aswell as ports forwarded automatically.
Anyone able to help?

item.title: Need a bit of Help ^^
item.dc:creator: @Miles1 Miles`
item.description:

I purchased a VPS to run a server on that I’ve been messing around with, I changed the ip in the client (client.java) to the IP of the VPS, and now it doesn’t work? The client doesn’t even load, it just says ‘error connecting trying in 5.’
